DESCRIPTION: When played, adds an #yupgraded copy of this card to your hand. NL Can be #yupgraded any number of times. NL Reset #yupgrades at the end of your turn. NL Cannot be #yupgraded outside of combat.
Randomizes cost and effects of certain cards when drawn.
A card that #yupgrades ALL cards in hand and adds #yFaster to your hand.
A card that applies #ySlow to an enemy (ALL enemies on upgrade) and adds #yStronger to your hand.
A power that gives you #yStrength every turn.
A debuff that deals damage at the end of creature's turn. If the enemy is #yconstricted, it will do its move first and then take damage from #yconstriction.
